item.title: Fun with an iphone app
item.description: Got a new iPhone app called sketchbook, by autodesk. http://itunes.apple.com/WebObjects/MZStore.woa/wa/viewSoftware?id=327375467&mt=8 You need to check this out. Trust it is really cool and loads of fun
